info.description: Information about the Nobel Prizes and the Nobel Prize Laureates
info.title: Nobel Prize Master Data

get.description: Obtain information about all Nobel Prizes or search for a specific set of Nobel Prizes. Note that not all information about the Laureates are provided in the output, as a request of making this endpoints response lighter. Call the laureates endpoint for full information.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sort order (result is sorted by year)

parameters.name: nobelPrizeYear
parameters.description: Year the Nobel Prize was awarded, in the form of YYYY

parameters.name: yearTo
parameters.description: Used in combination with nobelPrizeYear to specify a range of years to return results from. NobelPrizeYear is required

parameters.name: nobelPrizeCategory
parameters.description: Nobel Prize category

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of output (Default = json)

parameters.name: csvLang
parameters.description: Language of output if format is csv (Default = en)

200.description: Successful call of Nobel Prize(s) according to the filled fields

prizeAmount.description: Prize amount given at the year of the award

prizeAmountAdjusted.description: Prize amount adjusted according to Index number yearly average

schema.description: Successful response for Nobel Prize search

400.description: Bad request.The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax, modifications needed.

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date

get.description: Obtain information about one specific Nobel Prize. Used as unique identifier for links.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Nobel Prize category

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Year of the awarded Nobel Prize, in the form of YYYY

200.description: Successful call of the Nobel Prize giving the category and year

prizeAmount.description: Prize amount given at the year of the award

prizeAmountAdjusted.description: Prize amount adjusted according to Index number yearly average

schema.description: Successful response for Nobel Prize search

400.description: Bad request.The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax, modifications needed.

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date

get.description: Obtain information about Nobel Prize Laureates (persons and organizations) and their Nobel Prize(s), or search for a set of Laureates. Returns full information about the Laureates and Prizes.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of items to skip before starting to collect the result set

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The numbers of items to return

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order, result is sorted alphabetically by known name

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the Laureate (unique key for each Nobel Laureate)

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Laureate's name (person or organization)

parameters.name: gender
parameters.description: Laureate's gender if person

parameters.name: motivation
parameters.description: Text in Laureate's motivation

parameters.name: affiliation
parameters.description: Affiliation(s) for the Laureate at the time of the award

parameters.name: residence
parameters.description: Laureate's place of residence at the time is awarded

parameters.name: birthDate
parameters.description: Birth date of Laureate if Person. Search by year in the form of YYYY, by month -MM-, by day -DD or YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: birthDateTo
parameters.description: Return Laureates born within a range of years between birthDate and birthDateTo. BirthDate field is required

parameters.name: deathDate
parameters.description: Death date of Laureate if Person. Search by year in the form of YYYY, by month -MM-, by day -DD or YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: deathDateTo
parameters.description: Return Laureates deceased within a range of years between deathDate and deathhDateTo. DeathDate field is required

parameters.name: foundedDate
parameters.description: Founding date of Laureate if Organization. Search by year in the form of YYYY, by month -MM-, by day -DD or YYYY-MM-DD

parameters.name: birthCity
parameters.description: Laureate's city of birth if person

parameters.name: birthCountry
parameters.description: Laureate's country of birth if person

parameters.name: birthContinent
parameters.description: Laureate's continent of birth if person. Continent as in geonames.org standard

parameters.name: deathCity
parameters.description: Laureate's city of death if person

parameters.name: deathCountry
parameters.description: Laureate's country of death if person

parameters.name: deathContinent
parameters.description: Laureate's continent of death if person. Continent as in geonames.org standard

parameters.name: foundedCity
parameters.description: City where organization was founded

parameters.name: foundedCountry
parameters.description: Country where organization was founded

parameters.name: foundedContinent
parameters.description: Continent where organization was founded. Continent as in geonames.org standard

parameters.name: HeadquartersCity
parameters.description: City where organization's hearquarters are

parameters.name: HeadquartersCountry
parameters.description: Country where organization's hearquarters are

parameters.name: HeadquartersContinent
parameters.description: Continent where organization's hearquarters are. Continent as in geonames.org standard

parameters.name: nobelPrizeYear
parameters.description: The year the Nobel Prize was awarded, in the form of YYYY

parameters.name: yearTo
parameters.description: Used in combination with nobelPrizeYear to specify a range of years between nobelPrizeYear and YearTo. nobelPrizeYear is required

parameters.name: nobelPrizeCategory
parameters.description: Nobel Prize category.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Output format (Default = json).

parameters.name: csvLang
parameters.description: Language if output format is csv (default = en).

laureates.description: Model containing a list of Laureates

filename.description: Short slug version of familyname used in filenames

penname.description: Only for some Laureates in Literature category

place.description: City and county at the time, citynow and countrynow are as up to date names. Continent as geonames.org standard. LocationString is the combination of city, country, citynow and country now.
City and county at the time, citynow and countrynow are as up to date names. Continent as geonames.org standard. LocationString is the combination of city, country, citynow and country now.

laureateIfPerson.description: Fullname is the combination of given and family name

place.description: City and county at the time, citynow and countrynow are as up to date names. Continent as geonames.org standard. LocationString is the combination of city, country, citynow and country now.
City and county at the time, citynow and countrynow are as up to date names. Continent as geonames.org standard. LocationString is the combination of city, country, citynow and country now.

headquarters.description: City and county at the time, citynow and countrynow are as up to date names. Continent as geonames.org standard. LocationString is the combination of city, country, citynow and country now.

prizeAmount.description: Prize amount given at the year of the award

prizeAmountAdjusted.description: Prize amount adjusted according to Index number yearly average

items.description: Description of the Nobel Prize by Laureate
Laureate's full information and their respectives awarded Prizes

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date

404.description: Not Found. The requested resource could not be found but may be available again in the future.

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date

422.description: Unprocessable Entity. The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

message.example: There is not Laureate born that date
